document.full_text: more than 80 rebels and civilians were killed when insurgents attacked a camp in south sudan, the army said tuesday, in the latest violence to mar preparations for the region's independence.
document.title: more than 80 killed in south sudan violence: army
lines_and_colors: more than 80 rebels and civilians were killed when insurgents attacked a camp in south sudan, the army said tuesday, in the latest violence to mar preparations for the region's independence.
